website_summaries.verdict: This dispenser is pourable instead of scoop-able and can be used for many things other than pet food.
pros: The construction features a large flip-top opening for easily pouring in and out, and the handle is sturdy
cons: You can smell the food from outside the container, and it doesn't seem airtight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grill Pellets, very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these containers our for storing my Treager grill pellets and I'm very pleased. This holds a complete 20# bag of pellets perfectly, it's see through so you can see pellet quantity and they even stack! Plus it has a pouring spout. I'm not sure there's a better container for these pellets. Only possible draw back is it only holds one bag and it's not air tight. If storing in a garage or indoors that shouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight!
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful for this product. And for storing and pouring options, the lid was quite ingenious. However, while it has a tight fitting lid (hard snap shut), there is no gasket to give true air tight protection for your pet food. Though even if it did, there is a small gap left at the opening of the smallest pour spout at the top, even when closed, that renders the product useless at keeping food fresh. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Bakun

customer_reviews.title: Great large size to keep your food organized
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to a larger container medium 12lbs container with flip and pour lid - glad it said bpa free - it does close tight - video shows pup nudging cover before it is snapped closed - I like the cover this direction to easily scoop out the food - if you pour your food just switch cover to face other end - the height was a goid fit in this very small pantry - thicker container helps contain this pet food odor - good price at fifteen
customer_reviews.author: DParker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect food dispenser for my two small dogs! It's easy to open and pour without the worry of the lid coming off. Other containers/dispensers I've used would either overpour or the lid would come off causing a huge mess. The photo I added shows a 3lb. bag of dry dog food. I'd highly recommend this product to any pet owner. Many thanks and blessings!
customer_reviews.author: criddybug

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that the lid closes so well
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for my dog food and cat litter. These containers have made it so much easier to store both the food and litter. It's so much easier picking up the Buddeez container to add litter to the litter box. I like the fact that the lid closes so well. My daughter and the dogs would open the lid on the other container and then I would have food and litter every where.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Frangioso

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Food Container to date!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what it says it is. The airtight seal is perfect. The size is great because it fit nearly anywhere. I love that it has the opening for either pouring or using a scoop. And you can’t beat the cost! I like how lightweight it is and it fits my cats food perfectly! Let me know if you found this helpful 😊!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough positive things about this container. I am so glad that I ordered three of these for my dog and cat food. I don’t think they’re supposed to be airtight like ‘Tupperware’ but that’s all right, they are snug enough to keep the food fresh for as long as it lasts. Dog food doesn’t stay long around here with our two hungry puppies. I love the sturdy handle that is on one end of this container and the pouring lid that snaps shut when you’re finished with it. Both of those aspects make this container easy to manipulate. With all that being said plus the great price and free shipping through prime this is an excellent deal!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lexow

customer_reviews.title: These Stack Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hold chicken feed. They hold about 20 pounds of grain and although they're not completely airtight, they seal fairly well. I saw other reviews that said that the lid falls off, but that must be because people are not pushing it on hard enough in the first place. You have to practically lay on it to get the lid snapped on, but after that it stays on solidly. Don't be afraid to push down on the lid much harder than you think that you need to. I like that I can stack these two high and save floor space when storing my chicken food.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, but excellent container for storing and pouring pet food, bird seed, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, except larger than I expected. A little too large for me actually, but it's not really a complaint. I wanted 3 of these for all the different types of bird food I have. I already had 3 smaller ones. The only downside with it being so large is that it's more difficult to pour the bird food into the feeders, than with the smaller ones. But if you're using it for dog or cat food, it would be no problem. The design is great for pouring from the spout, as well as for storing food, keeping it air-tight and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Toria Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Buddeez Fresh Dry Dog & Cat food Plastic container because I was tired of having our bag of cat food on top of the dryer taking up space. So I put the cat food into this container and was able to find a place to put it. the only thing that I do not like about it is that the part that opens on the top is very easy to open so my son keeps getting into it. It would be nice if it had a little lock or something or childproof mechanism. But it keeps the cat food fresh and leaves me space. I will get a bigger one next time
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up, allows water to get in.
customer_reviews.text: It fits a bag of pellets for a smoker perfectly. However it’s not airtight or protect from ANY water from getting inside. We had a rainstorm while we were gone. This was outside and a ton of water got inside. No barrier there. Also when we went to pour from the spout option the whole thing came off (it was on correctly) spilling pellets EVERYWHERE! Wish we could get a replacement but can’t reach out to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ihnen

customer_reviews.title: Any Tighter & The Lid Wouldn't Come Off
customer_reviews.text: I don't even have a pet, but I do keep the many stray cats in my area well fed. Their presence seems to cut down on the mess the birds bring. I've kept their dry food in my little coat closet next to the front door. This container makes pouring easier, in addition to preserving freshness. I've never had a pest issue (ants/rodents) with regard to storing pet food (I have had dogs/cats previously). I could not imagine a better container to prevent such headaches. I had to pry the lid off with some force. When the two lid openings are closed, they seem to seal as well as humanly possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Carter

customer_reviews.title: keeps the mice away
customer_reviews.text: Our building has a mice problem. On many occasions, we've seen mice run out from wherever the hell they came from, and without flinching, they'll climb into our dogs food bowl to get a snack. One day, my husband noticed that there was an incredible amount of rat poop under our sink where we had kept the dog food in an open container. That's the day we bought this product. We haven't had the same problem since. It's also very lightweight and easy to use. We keep a scooper in the container and just pull it out from under the sink when it's our doggies dinner time.
customer_reviews.author: JesstheBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for convenience and strorage
customer_reviews.text: Storage seems pretty airtight, but maybe a little weak seal at the funnel lid. Overall, these are awesome quality and can't believe how cheap they were on sale. Would definitely recommend to any dog or cat owner. These are very sturdy and have cut down my time in the morning rush getting to work as I don't have to use the scoop any more. I just grab this very quickly and then pour. The dimensions at the top (lid) are roughly 7" wide. This was narrow enough that I was able to tuck these between my dryer and wall.
customer_reviews.author: Edan C

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulk baking items!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, not only for dog food but bulk food such as flour, sugar, and pancake mix. Used them for years. Still look and function like they are new. I use these containers so I can buy my baking items in bulk. I have smaller canisters that I refill from these larger containers. Great system
customer_reviews.author: Lori In Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Products!
customer_reviews.text: I've been locally looking for the perfect size dog food container that would conveniently fit on a shelf in the utility room. Purchased one at Menards for $17 which was ultimately too big and way too expensive for what I was using it for. This dog food storage container is a perfect fit it is durable it is so cleverly made and so durable. BUT THE POUR SPOUT AND HANDLE ARE THE BEST...NO MORE DOG FOOD SCOOP!! Also, i selected the economic goal selection and purchase the non-packaged version of this product. IT WAS ABSOLUTELY PERFECT IT WAS BRAND NEW NOTHING WRONG WITH IT. GREAT PRODUCT YOU GUYS!!
customer_reviews.author: nAtTiE bYrD217

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smoking pellet storage!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to keep my hardwood smoking pellets in my bbq shack without having to worry about them staying dry and fresh. I really like the way I can load a full 20 lb bag into the container and be able to see the content labels. With the dual lid access (scooping port of pouring lip) it's a simple process to load a hopper or smoke tube. Very st7urdy, feel strong and I epxect they will hold up well. Price seems quite good, too. Can't think of a thing that I would change.
customer_reviews.author: Skeezaroonie

customer_reviews.title: Great For Big Heavy Bags of Cat Litter
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a container to transfer cat litter into from the 40 pound bags I buy. I finally found this one and it is almost perfect. It's pretty big so it holds a lot of litter which is heavy so I would like it to have handles on each side, not just the back. I also think it is priced a bit high for a plastic container. Otherwise, it fits my need very well.
customer_reviews.author: NeeNee1019

customer_reviews.title: Storage Containers
customer_reviews.text: I like these large storage containers. I use them for bird feeding products. I personally keep the products in the storage bag they came in and clip the bag shut inside the container as this ensures even more freshness. A also like the handles that make using more convenient. These have one large opening wide enough to use a small scoop and a small poring option. Seem well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kess

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to 32lb  NOT! :(
customer_reviews.text: NOT WHAT WAS ADVERTIZED! ERRRRR! I I purchased a 24lb bag of small breed dog food. I poured the bag into the "WILL HOLD UP TO 32lb" container. See picture #1. Picture #2 Is whats left in the 24lb bag, approximately 1/3 of the bag. I measured what was actually still in the bag which was 5x8cups= 40 cups. I ordered what was advertised because I always purchase a 24lb bag. This is so aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cannot hold 20 lbs of sunflower hearts (no shell)
customer_reviews.text: This brand is very good. I probably had the larger version at my old house (which I left for the new owners as they wanted to continue my tradition of bird feeding. The house I moved to doesn't have the garage at the main level, so I wanted something a little smaller I could keep in the kitchen for the deck feeder. Good and sturdy, but I could only get about 16 lbs in. I don't use the pour functions because it's not practical with my feeding setting. I just scoop out with a small cup.
customer_reviews.author: lizzz

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted
customer_reviews.text: The spout on it is a good thing or it would be if the lid under it actually snapped shut. It won't snap shut and when you try to pour it opens and spills dry food all other the place. I put all my weight on it trying to get it to snap into place and tried to hammer it shut, it won't lock into place. This makes the item unless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I use it for kitty litter as we buy the bags so having a solid container to lift it works well. A 40lb bag of litter will just barely fit but makes it awfully heavy to lift so I just put about 3/4in at a time. Spout is perfect for pouring litter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Storage Bin
customer_reviews.text: Need this to keep cat food outside while away on a trip so my friend could feed the cat. It's AWESOME. I say this because I live in Texas where we have these lovely critters called Fire Ants.. that get into everything that involves food! This seals so well that they couldn't smell out the food, thus didn't get into it at all. Over a 2 week period! No creepy crawlies in the food at all!
customer_reviews.author: Meepers

customer_reviews.title: Finally got the lid to close.  It takes a lot of weight to do it, but much happier with the canister now.
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if the lid would snap close. As it is, if I should try to use the pour spout, the large opening will fly open and the catfood will be dumped in large quantity. The catfood is sure to get stale quickly too, and my male cat can open doors, so it won’t surprise me if he enters the pantry and turns this canister over. Big disappointment! Wish I’d thought to test the lid before filling. I hate doing returns, and this is a small purchase, so likely stuck with a defective container.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle Dell

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I had to get something to store my cat food, as there is a cat in the house that tears open bags to get at food. Anyway, I’m extremely happy, he is unable to get to the bag now. I just drop the whole bag in.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Micotto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet food
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put cat food in. I love it. It makes it so much easier to carry it from dish to dish (we have 2 dishes), and pouring the cat food is so much easier than pouring from the bag. I can't imagine anything that would be easier than this container It's got a handle to make pouring so easy, and a spout to direct where the food goes. But this, you won't be sorry !
customer_reviews.author: TeresaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Searched A Long Time For Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits the 16 Lb. of IAMS cat food purrrfectly & happens to be the best value on the market. Super build quality from the thick material, handy pour spout, to the ergonomics, just a well thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: AARON

customer_reviews.title: Perfect container for bird seed
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? Seriously, this container is perfect for bird seed... just empty the bag into the container and close the lid, when the feeders need to be filled up just flip the spout and pour with ease, it's that simple. Love the design and the price is tough to beat (I had searched for a container at various big box and supply stores but they were all double the price and not even as nice).
customer_reviews.author: Jon S

customer_reviews.title: Just right for birdseed, IMHO
customer_reviews.text: Good size, easy to transport, easy to pour directly into our cylindrical feeders. Also like the semi-transparency of container body, so we can see how much is in there. One time, early on, I grabbed it by the back of the top, and not the handle, and dumped birdseed all over everywhere. Fortunately, I was outside, so the birds got an extra treat. Haven't done that again! Very nice container overall – and not too "cutesy."
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nicklaus

customer_reviews.title: A Amazon Warehouse Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This was a Amazon warehouse product and normally is seventeen dollars and some change but I was able to get this Amazon warehouse one for six dollars and some change. Quite the bargain, I look for them all the time and most definitely are a bargain but a couple have been not so good. However, it’s rare I get a broken item. Four Stars⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon page lists dimensions for this product that are inaccurate. The container is actually smaller. It's about 10.5 inches by 5.5 inches by 15.5 inches. If I put my dog's 15lb bag of dog food in it doesn't fit, but if I cut off the top of the bag and put the first several days of food in a separate container, it ends up fitting in there alright. It is air tight, narrow, and easily maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: John Begley

customer_reviews.title: Not 💯% airtight, would you believe 95%? otherwise Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lid is not fully airtight. There is a tiny air gap at the smaller spout lip, as seem in the pictures. I will fashion a gasket out of Sugru (moldable rubber/glue) which will make it airtight. In the photos, it neatly holds the remains of the three smaller food bags I have, and sits next to an unopened 12 lbs. bag for reference, which will fit *perfectly* when the time comes. So far I'm 98% happy with it. I only wish I didn't have to fashion a gasket, but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Calamia

customer_reviews.title: Design of pour spout and handle AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll just echo all the rave reviews for this pet food storage bin: this is a perfect product! I bought it because space is very tight in my kitchen; I have three cats who don’t like to wait for food so I need something that holds a lot that fit between the microwave stand and the trash bin—the bin is a perfect fit for this space but it is also a wonderfully well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: Great container for dry pet food
customer_reviews.text: This container holds a 7 lb bag of cat food and provides airtight storage, keeping the food fresher longer. It also keeps my cats from getting into the food! They would claw or chew through the bag if I left it out. The main lid is a little hard to get off, but it only needs to be removed when changing the bag. (I leave the food in the bag. You could choose to pour the food into the container instead.) There is a flip top that opens for daily use so you can scoop out the food you need. I am happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JC Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Super-Clever Feed and Seed Holder!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous ways to keep my bird seed secure so as to not let seed moths fly throughout my house. This container is easy to fill via a large opening, and a flip-out spout making pouring a piece of cake. And the lids snap shut securely. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbygeorge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, super convenient
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pet products I've bought in a long time, at least for cat food. Medium sized container holds enough for two cats for a month, and then some. Easy to open and fill up. Flip-open pour spout and conveniently located handle makes filling bowls simple and fast. Seals up tight so the food stays fresh. The cats probably don't like it, though. Food used to be hidden in a bucket. Now they can see it, but can't get to it until I dole it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tobrid

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great for mischievous animals that have broken others. This is very very sturdy and my kitties broke the last one to get to the food. Good luck with that on this one! This one is super sturdy and durable. Love it, what would make this better would be to add a print or a pretty design to these :) hence the 4 out of 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pellet storage.
customer_reviews.text: They're solidly built plastic containers. Reasonably water tight, but not totally air tight because of the spout. I particularly like the design of the handle: The way it's shaped makes it easy to hold the container and pour out the contents when it's full. I have bigger bins for dog and cat foot, but I'm using these as storage for pellet grill fuel. Each one fits a 20lb bag worth of pellets in it.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Bought for storing wood pellets for my pellet grill.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for storing 20 lb pellet bags for my pellet grill and it fits exactly one bag. I had to tamp it down a couple of times and finish pouring in after the lid was put on to fit every pellet from the bag in. I'm not worried about it being air tight, just want to prevent it from getting wet and to store pellets so that I can easily switch between types of pellets.
customer_reviews.author: J. Matcuk

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Well, now I have just packed up and ordered the return on the second one of these. I cannot get the lid to shut all the way and so if I tried to use the pour spout the lid will fly open and spill out all the bird seed. Cannot believe this is the second defective one - I really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, handy - perfect size for 20 lb seed bags
customer_reviews.text: I love this container. I use it to store bird seed. I keep it in an outside shed. Other plastic containers have been chewed by mice. Not this one. The several openings are handy too. I can "pour" seeds when seed level is low and the easy open top makes "dipping" conveninet when seed level is high.
customer_reviews.author: gardenburd

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!  Good container.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this storage container since I've started feeding the birds and needed something to store the seeds in. I was able to use the spout to fill the bird feeder this morning and didn't spill a single seed. Probably a little larger than I need but I like it and no longer have to worry about clipping bags shut and making a mess when I pour.
customer_reviews.author: LBUG

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. This product is not air tight as stated. The pour spout is the culprit. This would be okay for something not needing a seal, but not for dog food.
customer_reviews.author: techdivakt

customer_reviews.title: Please note, this container is LARGE, just as described.
customer_reviews.text: When it's standing up on the floor, it comes up to my knee. It's not the seller's fault that I didn't read the description. I bought a different container with an 18-cup capacity, which is about the size of a cereal box. I'll give this one to my friend who has four dogs, and it will be perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top opens and spills everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The flip lid/pouring lid is cool, but doesn't work when the bucket is full. The weight of the dog food will tear off the entire lid and it will spill all over the floor. The flip lid only works when the container is half empty. Therefore, we don't bother with the lid. We just put a scooper in there.
customer_reviews.author: MsMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Plastic, holds  up to 16lbs
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase!!! Sturdy handle and lid, it will definitely last.. Plastic is very durable, its definitely NOT dollar store cheap plastic!!! Add said it holds up to 12lbs but the lable said holds up to 16lbs.. I bought 2 containers used 1 to put my dogs food in and the other for my cats food.. I will be buying a 3rd container to store cat litter.. Hope this helps someone...
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and perfect to fit in closet
customer_reviews.text: The container is very sturdy. I have it a 4 star only because the description is misleading as it holds 10 lbs of dog food and not 12 lbs. 12 lbs is for cat food. I purchased this instead of the vittles vault because it is taller and more narrow to fit in our laundry room closet without as much bending over. I do need an airtight container so will see. Still very happy and if it does not stay airtight I will use it for Trager pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Dena E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this canister to store my dry cat food, since we order the big bags of it for our kitties. It seals very nicely, and it's much easier to use the pour spout than it is to attempt to pour the food out of the bag into the cat feeders. Excellent and sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Roland

customer_reviews.title: Great container. I use it for bird seed
customer_reviews.text: Great container. I use it for bird seed. It has a large opening for emptying in the bag of seed. It seals well, and has a nice pour spout. It holds the seed plus a wide mouth funnel for filling my bird feeders. I'm happy with my purchase. It works perfect for what I needed it for. Nice price, perfect size, solid container. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the front of the lid
customer_reviews.text: Holds the food and seems to keep it pretty fresh. Design needs updating. The lid stays on fine while pouring, but if you happen to touch the front of the lid while opening the spout, the entire lid will come off. If the container is relatively full it will spill all over the ground
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Super functional dog food container
customer_reviews.text: We have a new baby coming and the dogs previous food closet is now a baby closet. We wanted somewhere to store is food that would keep it fresh but not allow little hands to get into it. So far this has been great. I love that you have the option to either pop open the lid or poor it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great container for pet or people food
customer_reviews.text: These containers are just what I needed to fit in my pantry. I'm pretty sure they wouldn't stop an ant invasion, but what does? I like to buy dried beans and rice in bulk, and these allow me to keep them fresh while saving space in my pantry. I've had the containers for a couple of months and, so far, I'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepyhead

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and tough
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for storing and serving our cat’s food! The only thing I wish to be different is that the spout was a little more narrow so I could more easily measure the food and control the flow. I’d recommend this and buy it again for sure. It’s stood up to two 47lb Cattle Dogs poking and pawing at it and two 8month old kittens having a parkour-esque go at the house.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Food Dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I can easily purchase the larger 14 lb bags of cat food, and add it to this dispenser. You can buy the larger bags, however, you'll have a little left in your bag, to add to the container, which doesn't take long. This keeps the food fresh, and it easy to pour into cat bowls. This is sturdy. I highly recommend this product to store your pet food.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Bird food storage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these some large and some small to store my bird food in the garage for 20 and 10 lb bags. I did not understand that moths will hatch out of the bird food--found out the hard way. These storage containers have stopped that problem. Tight fitting tops stay closed even when you lift and pour. Easy to scoop out or pour from top openings. Sturdy. Shipped quickly and arrived safely. .
customer_reviews.author: sassy lassy

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight! Do not use for foods and other perishable products.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same container in store (except with a red lid) and fell in love with it because it was airtight and durable. Therefore, I decided to get 2 more from Amazon. However, the 2 containers I received was not airtight at all! When I put the lid on the container, no matter how hard I press down, the front part of the lid raises up slightly not forming a seal. I'm going to keep them because I use these containers for my potting mixes and garden supplies. Just be wary if you buy these for foods or perishable items because it's highly unlikely it will be airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Deelish

customer_reviews.title: Handles Large Bag of Dry Pet Food Well
customer_reviews.text: Holds a very large bag of dry cat food. Easy to use, sturdy, good handle and large spout. Seals tightly. Did exactly what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: TerriC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, study and airtight
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right size for 15 pound bag of science diet small dog kibbles. Very sturdy and air tight. I tried the bigger size first, but it was too big and I will pass that one along to my daughter who has a large dog. very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.

customer_reviews.title: Fits good in pantry
customer_reviews.text: I like this item for my cats food. It fits perfectly in our pantry. Only thing is that it most likely will not hold a full bag of food. The bag we buy is the biggest bag of cat food. It was pretty much almost half gone when I brought this to use. But overall I like I like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: I read a previous post on these storage containers, for storing pellets for various pellet grills. A 20 lb bag of pellets will fit perfectly. I cut the flavor off the bag and taped it to the container...works great and able to pour out from the container too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Broggi

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD 16LBS
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT hold 16lbs. And with bag. My 15lb bag should have fit right in. Although the top snaps shut well there's no rubber to seal it "airtight". Since it says place bag in, I had to order XLG food safe ziplock and line. Then 2/3 of my 25lb bag fit when poured in. So I still have 1/3 bag left out. What a waste of money and time. Now I have to buy another or instead of a bag sitting there I have a container abd partial bag. I'd say holds 10lbs max
customer_reviews.author: Aileen M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we found these. I have been needing a storage solution for my dog's food for months ever since our brand stopped having the zip closure on the bags. These fit nicely against our fridge and don't take up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Pour spout does not snap shut in any way
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend it. The "pour spout" on the top does not snap shut in any way - much less seal. It just flops open / shut, and also is not flush when shut, allowing air (or bugs) to enter. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: RTR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for any animal
customer_reviews.text: The best thing to own if you want to save money and buy your pet food in bulk to save money. It’s bulky for storage if you don’t normally stock up but if you want to save money and buy a bigger bag of pet food this is what you need! It’s durable and has a great lock seal to keep bugs out. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the last bit out
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pour. The handle is comfortable. But I removed one star because it is hard to get the last bit of food out because the pour hole is offset from the edge an inch or so and the food gets stuck there. Overall, it’s still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this container for cat food hopping it was air tight and that is not the case for this container. I'm disappointed. I will have to leave the cat food in the velcro bag and then place it in this plastic container; in order to maintain fresh cat food
customer_reviews.author: Celi

customer_reviews.title: Buddeez 16 Qt Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent item but... but it barely fits a 25 pound bag of nyjer seed, when it is new you have to really cram it in the storage container. I did a lot of reading to decide on this size or the next larger one -- which was twice the size so would have been too big! Just want others to know if you don't want a snug fit, go up to the next size. The dispenser spout works really well for refilling bird feeders and overall it is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for and entire bag of Traeger pellets!
customer_reviews.text: I use this storage bin to hold Traeger pellets and it does a really good job at that. Keeps everything dry and fresh. Sturdy product and the pour spout on top makes it easy to pour pellets. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Emisha Rodriguez Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Fits Full Bag of Cat Food; Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, easy to use, and big enough for a full bag of cat food. We were tired of our two cats tearing into bags of cat food and of any opened bag of cat food stinking up the place, as the brand we give them has a very strong fish smell. This solves both problems. If you're concerned about the amount of food it will hold, we cut off the top of a 15.4lb bag of EVO Dry Cat Food and drop it in. It fits snugly. Just drop the top on, snap it closed, and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: SCF

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to lift & pour even when full. Keeps food airtight so my dogs can’t try to get at the cat food the kittens eat.
customer_reviews.author: RN4Life

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even plan on using the top spout feature and I ultimately decided it's much easier to pour the food into the reservoir on the back of my cat's food bowl. It's not as big or heavy as I expected but that turned out to be a great thing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it for cat kibble!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing - it is perfect for a full-sized bag of cat kibble. SO much easier than trying to handle the bag! Stores nicely, easy to pour, no mess. Lid stays on, easy to fill. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M. Suggs

customer_reviews.title: great bin
customer_reviews.text: I store my cat food in this. I've had no trouble using it, although I don't use the pour feature, just grab the food by hand. It's a little too well sealed as sometimes it's hard to get the top off
customer_reviews.author: pipparina

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis, so handling the large, heavy & awkward dry cat-food bags over the past 20+ years has been tough. This storage container is GREAT! Flip Lid = large opening, easy to fill. Smaller flip-up pour spout, along with the additional grip-handles exactly where one might need them = PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We stir rice in this one but have a larger one for cat food. Convenient and very easy to pour as it has a, for lack of better word, notch on the bottom to help with pouring!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I ordered the wrong size or I was sent the wrong one but the container was about 1/5th of the size we needed for the entire bag (13 lbs or so?). The top is also really poorly constructed and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: OrganizeZweet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome containers for wild bird seed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Buddeez for storing wild bird seed inside my home during hot summers. They work perfectly and are designed well. Don’t expect to store 12 lbs of black oil sunflower seed in the medium container. It probably holds 8 lbs instead. Likewise, the 20 lb container probably holds 15 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: JLR, Bastrop, TX

customer_reviews.title: The perfect dry pet food storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, cheap container for storing my dog's food and it's attractive too; beats having a bag of food (with a chip clip to keep it closed) just lying around. Not giant but not tiny either.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for what I needed it for. I keep it outside to feed my outdoor cat. Makes things more convenient for me. The lid fits tightly so I don't have to worry about it getting stale or animals getting into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Limehouse

customer_reviews.title: solved my possum problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this container to store dry cat food in for my outside cats. I'd been having a problem with possums getting into the large tupperware type container I had. I bought this and it's worked great, and no more possums getting into the cat food! Very study container and it'll hold about 10+lbs. of food.
customer_reviews.author: Tx Casscyn

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for easy handling and pouring. We purchased it for our wild bird seed. We have many feeders, so this container makes refilling bird feeders simple. No more dragging a 40# bag of seed from the front yard to the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Nokebe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Container!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to store cat food in and was so impressed I bought a second one for extra (unused) cat litter storage. Also, I am very happy to report the container are air tight and will keep out ants. I found ants on top of the container and had just filled it. But when I opened the container, not a single ant was inside. These containers are easily stack-able and the handle makes it very easy to pour. I love the two different size openings. I HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L

customer_reviews.title: Convenience with a handle
customer_reviews.text: Its way more convenient than the bag. My only wish is it was about another inch or two bigger in ht, width and volume so the whole large bag of cat food would fit. Still worth 5stars
customer_reviews.author: Steve Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Scoop Not Included
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a container with a scoop for cat litter, since I cannot lift much. I went with this one for its multifunctionality - the description and photos show a pour spout and a scoop. It seemed perfect! But, the scoop is not included. It's only going to cost a couple of dollars to get scoops for the two containers I bought, but it's still disappointing to get an item that is not as described. If I'd known it didn't come with the scoop, I would've purchased a different container.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these to put my dog and cat food in. I'm am so please. They are tall enough to hold a 13 lb bag, they are also stackable. The price is super great for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for tight storage space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store dog food in. It works great. Two ways to dispense the food. Really liked the shape so it fit in a tight space. Strong and durable. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it will hold the cat food, however you can ...
customer_reviews.text: it will hold the cat food, however you can still smell it where I store the food. Makes me think its not quite air tight due to the convenience opening/pour options on the top of the lid. Not even sure if this Fromms cat food should be kept airtight so only one star off.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Container
customer_reviews.text: I really like this container! It’s slim and fits in our cabinet with our other container of dog food. The top is versatile too. You can open the larger door and stick a whole dish in there and scoop up food or you can pour it with the slot that pulls out.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and quality
customer_reviews.text: We use this to hold dog food for our shih tzu. It works perfectly. Holds a lot of food and our scooper. It's easy to move around and store out of the way. The little flap on top makes it easy to open to scoop out the food with no spill. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There is no airtight seal on this which was very upsetting. The food seemed fine in the beginning but with no air tight seal you could smell the staleness of the food over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for dry cat food that would hold 10 pounds or less. It isn't heavy to lift, it has a nice handle on the side, it's easy to open, and it's made of sturdy plastic. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this for cat litter. The multiple size openings are great if we need to pour or scoop. And the balance is perfect for when you need to pour, you have complete control of speed and amount.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I got this for storing my puppy's food. It fits nicely on my counter and it is easy to open and close. It holds a good amount of food and looks nice. I'm glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Paris 21

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Storage
customer_reviews.text: Now that I am buying 22 lb bags of dog food my previous containers were too small or two large. I like the fact that this one will fit on the floor of my pantry under the bottom shelf. Someone had complained that is did not completely seal. It does but you have to push really firmly on the front of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.text: The top to mine doesn’t stay on. Which somewhat defeats the purpose of getting it. This means the cat food I have inside will go bad faster. I saw others say similar things as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heaver

customer_reviews.title: Versatile...
customer_reviews.text: Well designed...Seals tightly, multiple ways to "serve" my cat's kibble to them. They can't get into it and love watching me fill it up! Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: 6 year review
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 6 years now. No issues at all! Lid still tight and seals are decent.
customer_reviews.author: Smobien

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased 3 of these bins now for cat food, dog food, and after reading the reviews smoker pellets. Easy to pour handle & arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: TCombs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality.  Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I buy 50 pound bags of bird seed for my bird feeder and don't want to scoop or lift that crazy bag so I pour it out into this container for storage, then into my feeder as needed. The container is very well made. I've never had a problem with the lid popping off like some reviewers have said. I love the fact that there is a smaller mouth to pour from, then a larger one to scoop out of or add more to if needed. It's pretty big so don't expect to lift it one handed if it's full of food/seed/etc. Very useful - I would purchase another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Starscream

product_meta.title: Buddeez Large (Up to 12lb) Fresh Dry Dog & Cat Food Plastic Storage Container with Flip Lid and Pour Spout for Pet Food and Bird Seed, BPA Free
product_meta.description: Heavy-duty dispenser for large bags - up to 12 lb. dog food, 12 lb. cat food and 20 lb. bird seed bags.
feature_bullets: Bag-In features allows dispensing of seed or food from the original bag while maintaining nutritional information
BPA Free, FDA-approved food contact safe resin.
Great to take pets food to boarder or house sitter

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
